在展开的选择面板中完成颜色值的选择。.en-us: Complete the color value selection in the expanded selection panel.

不同尺寸的颜色选择触发器。.en-us: Different sizes of color selection triggers.

设置参数`disabled=True`开启禁用状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `disabled=True` to enable the disabled state.

设置参数`allowClear=True`允许用户清空已选颜色值。.en-us: Set the parameter `allowClear=True` to allow the user to clear the selected color value.

设置参数`disabledAlpha=False`允许用户额外选择透明度值。.en-us: Set the parameter `disabledAlpha=False` to allow the user to select the transparency value.

设置参数`placement`控制悬浮层展开方位。.en-us: Set the parameter `placement` to control the floating layer expansion direction.

设置参数`mode`控制颜色选择模式。.en-us: Set the parameter `mode` to control the color selection mode.

设置参数`showText=True`显示颜色值文本。.en-us: Set the parameter `showText=True` to show the color value text.

设置参数`trigger`控制悬浮层展开触发方式。.en-us: Set the parameter `trigger` to control the floating layer expansion trigger mode.

设置参数`presets`自定义添加预设颜色选项组。.en-us: Set the parameter `presets` to add custom preset color options groups.

监听颜色值选择。.en-us: Listen to the color value selection.
